articles.description: Seemingly a difficult concept in the best of times, "Snowpiercer" becomes more problematic in the midst of a pandemic, focusing as it does on humanity's warring remnants in a post-apocalyptic world.
articles.content: (CNN)Seemingly a difficult concept in the best of times, "Snowpiercer" becomes more problematic in the midst of a pandemic, focusing as it does on humanity's warring remnants in a post-apocalyptic world. Even adopting a charitable view of that bleak outlook, … [+2945 chars]

articles.title: ‘Purple Rain’ Prince concert is streaming on YouTube all weekend long - WJW FOX 8 News Cleveland
articles.description: Through Sunday, Prince is streaming live. Or at least a version of him from 1985 is streaming on YouTube all weekend long.
articles.content:
(WJW) Through Sunday, Prince is streaming live. Or, at least the 1985 version of him is streaming on YouTube all weekend long.

articles.title: Why Kyle MacLachlan Didn't Second-Guess 'Capone' - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Decades after working with David Lynch on 'Dune,' the actor did not hesitate to join a project helmed by Josh Trank, despite the filmmaker's previous difficulties in the blockbuster sphere.
articles.content:

articles.description: Fans of 'The Favourite' should find the Hulu drama 'The Great,' starring Elle Fanning as Catherine the Great, captivating.
articles.content: Any review of Hulu’s The Great should start off with this very important note: Are you an animal lover? Do you find it physically upsetting to watch any harm come to a furry creature, in real life or on-screen? Then The Great is definitely a hard pass for you… [+4728 chars]
